mapper.sql: id, group_id, display_name, contact, contact_phone, address
mapper.select:
select
from sys_company where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_company
id,
group_id,
display_name,
contact,
contact_phone,
address,

mapper.update:
update sys_company
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_company set group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
